summary: Tested Next.js migration - Backend APIs working well (20/22 tests passed), but frontend has critical migration issues preventing proper loading

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 520 instead of expected 400 for invalid SMILES
Returns 520 instead of expected 500 for invalid SMILES

critical_bugs.impact: Prevents app from loading, missing styles
critical_bugs.solution: Change import to '../src/app/globals.css' or move globals.css to app/ directory

critical_bugs.issue: Server Component error - uses useState/useEffect without 'use client' directive
critical_bugs.impact: Prevents component from rendering, causes blank page
critical_bugs.solution: Add 'use client' directive at top of MainLayout.jsx

ui_bugs.issue: Completely blank pages - no content rendering
ui_bugs.impact: App unusable - dashboard, experiments, simulation pages all blank

ui_bugs.issue: No Tailwind styles applied - missing CSS compilation

passed_tests: Page navigation (routes exist but content fails to render)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix Next.js migration issues - 1) Fix globals.css import path in app/layout.jsx, 2) Add 'use client' directive to MainLayout.jsx, 3) Ensure all client components are properly marked, 4) Verify Tailwind CSS compilation in Next.js setup
